article_title: Travel search engine Skyscanner eyes U.S. market after Miami office opens
article_text:
The Edinburgh-based company opened its Americas office in Miami in 2013

It has grown exponentially since and is now worth $1.6 billion

Up next: a partnership with Amazon’s Alexa on Echo

article_metadata.news-keywords: Skyscanner, gareth williams, cheap flights, randi wolfson, jenny stephens, shane Corstorphine
article_metadata.description: In a field of heavily marketed brands such as Expedia and Kayak, Skyscanner sets itself apart with its 1,200 travel partnerships around the globe.
article_metadata.title: Travel search engine Skyscanner eyes U.S. market after Miami office opens | Miami Herald
